issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: The problem is not completely described.
resolution.name: Incomplete

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

fields.description:
With CBO off there is a redundant filter operator 
{code}
 Filter Operator
                          predicate: ((null is null and (_col22 = _col51)) and (_col1 = _col26)) (type: boolean)
{code}

Possibly this is why Vectorization is getting disabled with CBO off, this operator doesn't exist with CBO on.

Query 
{code}
select 
    count(*)
from
    (SELECT 
        'store' as channel,
            'ss_addr_sk' col_name,
            d_year,
            d_qoy,
            i_category,
            ss_ext_sales_price ext_sales_price
    FROM
        store_sales, item, date_dim
    WHERE
        ss_addr_sk IS NULL
            AND store_sales.ss_sold_date_sk = date_dim.d_date_sk
            AND store_sales.ss_item_sk = item.i_item_sk) a;
{code}

Explain with CBO OFF

  Stage-0 depends on stages: Stage-1

fields.summary: Hive : With CBO disabled Vectorization in Map join disabled causing 100% increase in elapsed time and CPU (possibly due to redundant filter operator)
